main.name: Will you be my valentine‚ù§Ô∏è
main.description: I want you to be my special someone this Valentines Day. You always make my days so meaningful and special and you mean the world to me. I want to take you on a magical journey that only has space for two
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are a list of my skills

education.description: It would be kind of sad if you chose someone else to be your Valentine when you have me. That's kinda what I'm here for so please choose me ü•∫üòî

work.title: Senior UX God
work.description: Sure you can be with any ordinary guy for Valentines day but wouldn't you want someone who is obsessing over you and is always there for you? I am in love with you and everything about you is so gracious and perfect. You are so beautiful and the prettiest I have seen and you make my heart skip beats when you are with me :).
